summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5925 for the improvement of Fauntleroy Place from West Cloverdale Street on the east to 45th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 78325, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
